## Introduction

```{r}
## load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

lichen_data <- read_excel("/Users/carteryoung/Desktop/cr/FULL_coenogonium.xlsx")
write.csv(lichen_data, "lichen.csv", row.names = FALSE)

(g <- ggplot(lichen_data, aes(x = `Substrate_Diameter`, y = `Surface_Area`)))

g + geom_point(aes(x = `Substrate_Diameter`, y = `Surface_Area`), 
               shape = "diamond", 
               color = "darkolivegreen3", 
               size = 2) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)

```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(agricolae)
library(plyr)
library(lmodel2)
library(rstatix)

lichen <- lichen_data

reg.lichen <-ggplot(lichen_data, aes(x = Substrate_Diameter, y = Surface_Area)) + 
  geom_point(size=3)+ 
  geom_smooth(method="lm",se=FALSE, color="black")+ 
  theme_tufte(base_size=20) + 
  geom_rangeframe() +
  scale_y_continuous() + #name axis here 
  scale_x_continuous()+ #name axsis here
  theme(axis.ticks.length=unit(-0.25, "cm"), 
        axis.text.x = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5), "cm")),
        axis.text.y = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5), "cm")))
reg.lichen
```
